name: Accessories
description: And finally welcome to the Armament area of my shop. Weapons, Armor, First Aid Kits, and more, everything a danger-seeking individual could need to locate treasure with!

quests.name: Green and Healthy
quests.description: As you've traversed and survived in your world, you may have noticed these little Red and Yellow hearts you can find from various dangerous creatures. Putting them in a vessel enables you to increase your vitality well beyond normal (thanks to the magical nature of your world). We began researching them, and have synthesized a third color for you to use : green. These are fairly expensive to make, but a full set of Green, Yellow, and Red Heart Canisters can make you thrice as healthy as normal!
